description: A document issued by the Social Security Administration that provides the individual's Social Security Number (SSN) and name.

social_security_number.instruction: The unique identifier assigned by the Social Security Administration to the individual.

name.instruction: The full name of the individual to whom the Social Security Number is assigned.

established_for_usa_administration.instruction: The statement indicating that the number is established for the USA Social Security Administration.

signature.instruction: The signature of the individual or the authorized representative.
